short_summary: Firm Rental Period: May 1st to September 30th each year.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### W6895-220085 - Tractor Rental – DND COLD LAKE
**Document Reference**: WS3919188661-Doc3940319779

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal for the rental of one (1) 140 H.P. dual 540/1000 hp, minimum, agricultural tractor on an “as and when” requested basis.

**Key Dates**

* **Publishing Date**: March 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: April 25, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: April 30, 2026, and an optional additional one-year period (May 1, 2026, to April 30, 2027)

**Bidder Requirements**

* Respondents must submit a detailed proposal complying with the specifications outlined in the Contract Bid Form.
* All bids must be submitted in writing by the deadline set above.
* All required supporting documentation must be included with the bid.

**Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contracting Details**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Point of Contact**

* Lorraine Jenkinson, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Submission Instructions

* Bids must be submitted in writing and in accordance with the specifications outlined in the Contract Bid Form.
* All required supporting documentation must be included with the bid.
* Late bids will not be accepted. Uploaded documents and bid submissions are only accepted through the specified online platform.

For further information, please refer to
